maxJobs.title: Maximum Jobs
maxJobs.description: Number of jobs to fetch per run (1-50)

paymentVerified.title: Payment Verified Only
paymentVerified.description: Require clients to have a verified payment method.

status.title: Job Status
status.description: Select job status or leave blank for any.

category.title: Category Slug
category.description: Filter by Upwork specialty category slug (e.g. web-mobile-software-dev).

categoryGroup.title: Category Group Slug
categoryGroup.description: Filter by Upwork category group slug (e.g. dev-it).

country.title: Client Country
country.description: Filter by buyer country (ISO-3166 alpha-2). Leave blank for any.

tags.title: Required Tags
tags.description: Comma-separated tags that must appear on the job (matches any of the values).

postedAfter.title: Posted After
postedAfter.description: Only include jobs posted after this timestamp (ISO format: 2023-01-01T00:00:00Z).

postedBefore.title: Posted Before
postedBefore.description: Only include jobs posted before this timestamp (ISO format: 2023-01-01T00:00:00Z).

budgetMin.title: Minimum Fixed Budget
budgetMin.description: Filter fixed-price jobs with budget greater than or equal to this amount.

budgetMax.title: Maximum Fixed Budget
budgetMax.description: Filter fixed-price jobs with budget less than or equal to this amount.
